name: Merchants
description:
Everything Has a Price
Merchant cultures are trade-focused societies that see opportunity everywhere. They value negotiation, networking, and turning profit from any situation. A good deal is as satisfying as any victory in battle, and wealth opens all doors.

options.name: The Deal Sustains
options.description: Successful commerce energizes you mentally. You regain 1 Resolve whenever you complete a profitable trade, negotiate a favorable deal, or identify a valuable opportunity others missed. However, losing money on a deal or being cheated causes you to lose 1 Resolve and gain anxiety about future transactions. If your total wealth drops below what you consider 'acceptable' (GM discretion based on your background), you gain 1 Stress per day until you restore your fortunes. You can spend 1 Resolve to instantly appraise the true value of any item or deal.
